content: with the next round round 1 k20 22 22 23 23 k2tog work in pattern across top of foot ssk k to end of round round 2 work in pattern repeat rnds 1-2 working 1 less stitch before the k2tog until 56 60 64 68 72 sts remain ending with round 2 foot continue working as established until foot measures desired length about 1 5 / 4 cm less than foot length refer to chart at the end of pattern for more information about foot length by shoe size shape toe drop mc and pick up cc1 set up row for shifting beginning of round bor remove marker k14 15 16 17 18 place new bor marker side of foot k28 30 32 34 36 pm knit to end of round round 1 k1 ssk knit to 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 sm k1 ssk knit to 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 - 52 56 60 64 68 sts remain round 2 knit repeat rnds 1-2 until 32 sts remain 16 between each marker repeat round 1 until 16 sts remain 8 sts between each marker finishing with 8 sts on each needle hold needles parallel and graft sts using kitchener stitch see instructions on next page weave in ends on inside of sock © sonder yarn co 2022 | www sonderyarnco com | for personal use only sonder socks | page 5 information on toe shaping abbreviations kitchener stitch bor beginning of row/round pull yarn all the way through for each step co cast on cc contrast colour insert needle purlwise into first stitch on front dpn do not remove from needle k knit insert needle purlwise into first stitch on back dpn remove from needle k2tog knit two stitches togethe insert needle knitwise into second stitch on back dpn do not remove from mc main colour needle p purl insert needle knitwise into first stitch on front dpn remove from needle p2tog purl two stitches together pm place marker repeat four steps until all stitches are grafted together round s round s ssk slip one stitch knitwise slip a second stitch knitwise then knit them together through the back loop sm slip marker st s stitch es tbl knit through the back loop wyib with yarn in back wyif with yarn in front © sonder yarn co 2022 | www sonderyarnco com | for personal use only
